Gordon,
Assuming that you're just talking about swords, Albert Yamanaka published a list with descriptions in his newsletters, although I have no idea if it is complete or correct.  He has 14 Kokuho and 25 Juyo Bijutsuhin described.  This was a particular area of interest of the late Jim Kurrasch and he published something on his web site at http://members.cox.net/jkk/misimpor.htm  Not all of the items that Yamanaka mentioned are on Jim's site.

What exactly is she looking for?

Jim
  ----- 


  Hi all,



  I've had a request from a mom helping with a school project concerning the
  missing NTs from after WWII. She would like to know what is on the list.
  Anyone got a copy somewhere?



  Gordon
